title: Short-Intensive Program for Cultivating Expert Learners Based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening learner-customized instructional design and implementation competencies by applying UDL principles in smartphone-centric learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three UDL principles (engagement, representation, action & expression) to actual language instruction design
Learners can analyze individual needs and develop three or more personalized educational strategies.
Learners can measure the effectiveness of UDL-based instruction using summative assessment tools.

resources: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Guidelines PDF
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
